alert.note: Alert for Central Walton; Coastal Bay; South Walton (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 30 at 7:30PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of western Bay and southwestern Walton Counties through 815 PM EDT/715 PM CDT/... At 730 PM EDT/630 PM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles east of Niceville to 11 miles southeast of Eglin Air Force Base. Movement was south at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Santa Rosa Beach, Eglin Air Force Base, Freeport, Inlet Beach, Portland, Villa Tasso, Blue Mountain Beach, Seaside, Miramar Beach, Point Washington, Sunnyside, Gulf Pines, Bunker, Laguna Beach, Grayton Beach, Hollywood Beach, Seagrove Beach, Sandestin and Four Mile Village. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Central Walton; Coastal Bay; South Walton
